snippet.title: DuckTales: Remastered - Mega Mix 2014 Trailer
snippet.description:
The life and times of Scrooge McDuck are as close as a copy of DuckTales: Remastered. Now available on Steam, Xbox Live Arcade, PlayStation Network, Wii U eShop and at retail stores across North America!

For more DuckTales information: http://capcom-unity.com/ducktales

Subscribe to the Official Capcom Unity Channel: 
http://bit.ly/Qjb2MV
